tool_description: Yotpo is an innovative platform that enhances the review process for e-commerce customers, making it a fun and social experience. Users can read and write reviews seamlessly. To get started, sign up for a free account at Yotpo and explore example sites where Yotpo is implemented.

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews
api_list.description: Fetches all reviews for a specific product associated with a given app_key.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: Specifies the number of reviews to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Specifies the page number of reviews to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: app_key
required_parameters.description: Your application key assigned after signing up for Yotpo.

required_parameters.name: domain_key
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the product as stored when creating the review.
